title: Gridded Boreal Aboveground Biomass Density c.2020 at 30m resolution
description: Aboveground biomass density c.2020 gridded to 30m derived from ICESat-2, Harmonized Landsat-Sentinel2 and Copernicus DEM. Band 1 is the data band. Band 2 is the standard error.
